author: terencechain
content: Syncing devnet6 has been tricky — I keep getting stuck at slot 57472. Based on the logs, the error says “no peers with required blocks are found.” Are there any reliable bootnodes we recommend? The ones Lighthouse uses would be good

author: pawandhananjay
content: We were struggling with sync too last i checked. a lot of clients seem to be missing some of the requested blocks/data columns in the by range responses that are present on the canonical chain. Basically the client advertises they are synced to the wall slot head + specific columns and then doesn't return all the requested columns in the byrange requests
